node.detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，居於堅尼地城西寧街西寧閣。他自 3 月 8 日開始發燒、肌肉痛及腹瀉， 3 月 11 日到一院校的診所求醫，其後到瑪麗醫院急症室求診。其深喉唾液樣本於 3 月 12 日證實對病毒呈陽性反應，已被安排入住屯門醫院接受治療。患者於潛伏期內曾外遊，於 2 月 22 日至 3 月 1 日在美國波士頓，再由波士頓經日本東京於 3 月 2 日抵達菲律賓馬尼拉，他於 3 月 8 日乘搭國泰航空 CX930 由馬尼拉返抵香港。患者於 4 月 12 日出院，後出現輕微氣喘症狀再度入院，檢測對病毒呈陽性，其後出院。
node.detail_en: The patient with underlying illness lives at Serene Court, Sai Ning Street, Kennedy Town. He developed fever, myalgia and diarrhea since Mar 8. He attended a clinic at an institution on March 11 and then attended the Accident and Emergency Department at Queen Mary Hospital. His deep throat saliva specimen was tested positive for COVID-19 virus on March 12 and has been arranged for treatment at Tuen Mun Hospital. The patient had been overseas during his incubation period including to Boston in the USA between Feb 22 and Mar 1. He then travelled from Boston to Manila in the Philippines via Tokyo in Japan arriving Manila on Mar 2. He returned to Hong Kong from Manila by flight CX930 by Cathay Pacific on Mar 8. The patient was discharged from hospital on April 12. He later began experiencing mild asthma and was readmitted to positive. His tests came out positive. He has since been discharged from hospital.

node.remarks_zh: 衛生防護中心於 4 月 25 日新增有關地點
node.remarks_en: The Centre for Health Protection added this location on Apr 25.

node.remarks_zh: 患者是美籍港人，持香港居民身份證，有長期病，其家屬是港大職員
node.remarks_en: Patient American Hongkonger with HKID and has underlying illnes, his family member is HKU employee.

node.remarks_zh: 深喉唾液樣本證實病毒呈陽性反應，被安排入住屯門醫院接受治療
node.remarks_en: Deep throat saliva specimen was tested positive for coronavirus and arranged for management at TMH.

node.location_zh: 香港大學醫療保健處（明華綜合大樓）
node.location_en: University Health Service, The University of Hong Kong (Meng Wah Complex)
node.remarks_zh: 3 月 8 日開始發燒、肌肉痛及腹瀉
node.remarks_en: Patient developed fever, myalgia and diarrhea since Mar 8

node.remarks_zh: 在港大診所求醫後再到瑪麗醫院急症室求診
node.remarks_en: Sought treatment at A&E Dept of QMH after attending HKU clinic.
Patient had travel history during the incubation period.
